title: Mobile-Based Collaborative Mathematics Design Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary-level foundational math concepts (functions, statistics, geometry) and basic smartphone utilization skills
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented mathematical modeling course for learners preparing to enter medical/legal/technical fields. Lightweight learning environment accessible solely via smartphones

learning_goals: Learners can specifically explain three collaborative learning design strategies for solving math problems in real-world occupational contexts
Learners can create microlearning sequences of five or more stages using a visual learning design tool based on IMS-LD standards
Learners can complete two math modeling tasks collaboratively with team members in a mobile environment and achieve at least 80% proficiency in formative assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
